author: mattsicker
msg: - Remove duplicated code that was migrated to log4j-api.

author: mattsicker
msg: Add LoaderUtil class to isolate ClassLoader utility class.
- Code based on the Loader class in log4j-core.
- Provides the functionality from ProviderUtil.findClassLoader() (which will delegate to this class in an upcoming revision).

author: mattsicker
msg: - The use of LogManager.setFactory() doesn't appear to be all that helpful when the old factory has already been used during class static initialization. A better approach is in the works.

author: woonsan
msg: APA-63: remote target uri cleaning; content rewriter handling; header handling; gzip content encoding handling; dispatch like request dispatcher include handling.
